content:
Here's the agenda for our next meeting: https://hackmd.io/@rust-libs/SkPmShkLD

Same drill as last time, if you have anything you wish to have on the agenda for next week please use this thread to mention it
i went ahead and created action items from our meeting and wrote down who is assigned to each
there are a bunch of unassigned status reports for tracking issues so if anyone wants to take responsibility for any of those lmk and I'll put your name on it
I can start looking into stabilizing error source iterators
awesome, got your name on it now
Is it possible to pin messages in threads?
idk
It would be nice to have topic names be URLs also fwiw
oh that does seem to work actually
https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/257204-project-error-handling/topic/2020-10-12.20Meeting.20Agenda
w/e, I'll just repost the minutes whenever they scroll too far into the past
or hopefully ppl can easily jump to the start of the thread

Can we self-assign to some tasks? I would like to get work on some of the Action Items for the next meeting. However, I am not sure which requires least knowledge about the language (stabilizing Error::type_id? or messages?)
oh, absolutely! just let me know which ones you're going to take care of and I'll update the agenda
stabilisation are often the easier prs, you can follow the guide and make a PR :smile: can ping me if you need help
Ok so I will take the Error::type_id stabilization
i can work on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/66745 but I'm not sure how much I'll manage to do before the next meeting
sounds good
the immediate goal is just a status update if that helps
_not sure if you meant you'd be working on that issue_
Just added an agenda item about drafting that _long term vision_ blog post I mentioned during our last meeting. Weâ€™ll see if I finish drafting it up by the next meeting ðŸ™ƒ
good call
meeting in 2 hours
in 15 mins? Is there a way to listen in?
it's chat only
oh! ok then
